amendment.description: To make clear that land transferred under the bill shall remain part of the Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4068 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4068 proposed by Senator Craig for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S11582; text: CR S11582) To make clear that land transferred under the bill shall remain part of the Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4068 proposed by Senator Craig for Senator Campbell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4068 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
